## useNFTSupply() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Use this to get a the total (minted) supply of your ERC721 contract.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useNFTSupply(contract?: Erc721<any>): react_query.UseQueryResult<BigNumber, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contract | Erc721&lt;any&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> an instace of a contract that extends the Erc721 spec (nft collection, nft drop, custom contract that follows the Erc721 spec) |

<b>Returns:</b>

react\_query.UseQueryResult&lt;BigNumber, unknown&gt;

a response object that incudes the total minted supply

## Example


```javascript
const { data: totalSupply, isLoading, error } = useNFTSupply(<YourERC721ContractInstance>);
```
